articles.title: White House defends FEMA after study finds Hurricane Maria killed 5,000 in Puerto Rico
articles.description: The White House on Wednesday shook off criticism of the emergency response to Hurricane Maria following a Harvard study that estimated the death toll from last year's tragedy in Puerto Rico may have reached 5,000. "We have been supportive of Gov. Rosello's efforts to ensure full accounting."

articles.title: The better your sense of smell, the more you enjoy sex, study suggests
articles.description: "The perception of body odors such as vaginal fluids, sperm and sweat seems to enrich the sexual experience," German researchers found.

articles.title: Here is a list of people who have come to Roseanne Barr's defense
articles.description: Several conservative figures stepped forward to defend Roseanne Barr from what they deem a hypocritical Hollywood culture and censorship in the name of overzealous political correctness.

articles.title: Roseanne Barr has moved from Ambien to her co-stars in targeted Tweets after show cancellation
articles.description: No rest for the weary. After apologizing, Roseanne Barr is accusing her co-stars of throwing her 'under the bus' in a new series of tweets.

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein indicted by New York grand jury, prosecutors say
articles.description: Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus Vance said the indictment, which follows Harvey Weinstein being charged with the felonies on Friday, \

articles.title: Donald Trump: I had a 'great' meeting with Kim Kardashian at the White House
articles.description: The reality TV star met with President Trump at the White House to discuss prison reform Wednesday. During the meeting, she was expected to advocate for the release of 62-year-old Alice Marie Johnson.

articles.title: Sarah Sanders gets choked up after child asks about about 'senseless' school shootings
articles.description: "At my school, we recently had a lockdown drill," Benje Choucron, 13, said, reading from a piece of paper. "One thing that affects mine and others' mental health is the worry that we or our friends could get shot at school."

articles.title: Warren Buffett almost invested $3 billion in Uber because he's a fan of new CEO
articles.description: The talks earlier this year fell through after the investor asked for favorable terms for his $3 billion investment, according to reports.

articles.title: 8-month-old baby girl dies after she was attacked by pet dog in Florida
articles.description: A male pit bull the family raised from a puppy got away from the child's grandmother and fatally attacked the baby in her bouncy chair, police said.

articles.title: Michigan man punches bear in the nose to save his beagle’s life
articles.description: A man in the Boyne Falls area kicked and punched a bear after it bit his beagle. The dog needed several stitches in its side and rear end.
